title: The Pulse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Organic, Western, Take-out, British, English
description: Cafe offering vegetarian food that is locally and ethically sourced wherever possible. Serves breakfast, cakes, snacks, smoothies and drinks. Has vegan ice cream. The cafe has its own solar panels and runs on 100% renewable energy from Good Energy. It's a social enterprise providing work experience opportunities for people who are disadvantaged in the labor market. Hosts film nights, workshops, and meetings. Located in the converted old Labour Hall on Park Road which is a 10 minute walk from train station and 5 minutes from the nearest bus stop.
